column4: Hello! I have a DVD image (iso), and I would like to burn it. The problem is, that the iso file is a little bit larger than the capacity of my disk. How could I solve it? I tried DVD95, but it crashes when builds up the new iso file. I tried vamp also, but I couldn't give an iso file as a source file for compress the dvd.
maye its a dual layer image, some images are bigger than the disks. Have you tried just burning it
it is not dual layer, it is just about 100 mb larger than a normal dvd
